title: Justice League
description: DC’s greatest heroes team up to battle powerful threats and save the world.

title: Kim Possible
description: A high school student saves the world from evil villains in her spare time.

title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
description: Scooby and the gang uncover mysteries and dark secrets in their hometown.

title: Avatar the Last Airbender
description: Aang, the last Airbender, must master all elements to defeat the Fire Nation.

title: Samurai Jack
description: A samurai warrior is flung into a dystopian future by his arch-nemesis Aku.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
description: Bruce Wayne fights crime in Gotham City as the mysterious Batman.

title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
description: A teenager discovers a secret world of trolls beneath his hometown.

title: Generator Rex
description: A teenager with nanites battles monsters and tries to save humanity.

title: Ben 10
description: Ben Tennyson uses a device called the Omnitrix to transform into various aliens.

title: Teen Titans
description: Young superheroes team up to fight villains and handle teenage life.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Four mutant turtles trained in ninjitsu fight crime in New York City.

title: The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
description: Marvel’s greatest heroes unite to face powerful threats to Earth.

title: Weathering with You
description: A teenage boy runs away to Tokyo and meets a girl who can control the weather.

title: Suzume
description: A high‑school girl embarks on a mystical journey to close doors causing disasters.

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage of his village.

title: Doremon
description: A robotic cat from the future helps a clumsy boy navigate life’s challenges.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: A young swordsman fights demons to save his sister and avenge his family.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights to survive against monstrous giants in a dystopian world.

title: Crayon Shin-chan
description: A mischievous five‑year‑old causes hilarious chaos with his wild antics.

title: Coco
description: A boy journeys to the Land of the Dead to uncover his family’s musical heritage.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A young Viking befriends a dragon and changes his tribe’s view on the creatures.

title: Your Name.
description: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and form a deep connection across time.

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat with culinary dreams befriends a chef to pursue cooking in Paris.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A robotics prodigy teams up with friends and an inflatable robot to fight crime.
